description:

He does dance for guys on occasion and readily admits that the guys tip way better. Perhaps we know a big 'ole gun when we see one and are willing to pay tribute with a five or twenty.

Bralick loves to laugh and play to the camera, so the solo is pretty awesome.

title: Bralick - Solo
